screenshot.alt: Screenshot of a .vrpackage file in SimLab Composer 10
screenshot.caption: VRPACKAGE file open in SimLab Composer 10

description: The VRPACKAGE format is designed to provide an immersive viewing experience that allows the viewer to step into a 3D scene when opened with a VR application and compatible device. A VR scene may be used for various purposes, such as mechanical training, architectural tours, and previewing products.
NOTE: To create a VRPACKAGE file with SimLab Composer, create a scene, select File â†’ Export , then choose the "SimLab VR Package" format from the dropdown menu.
